resources.string:
Safety Tracker v0.1 
Safety tracker is a non-intrusive solution for keeping track of your movement using your phone, should you decide take a step outside for a couple of hours or visit the mall. 

It is a solution born out of necessity, if you are familiar with the current state of things in Nigeria. 
You can enter up to 3 email addresses of people who will have access to your location history logs should anything happen to you. [You’ll have to notify them yourself that you did.]. You only need to setup once, subsequent information can be altered as you please. Your location history is available on the web client. 

Information about your location history will be cleared on request or you can clear it yourself by using the “PURGE TRACKING SESSION” button. 
Note that after using this, your current location history is lost forever until you start another tracking session.
I agree with whatever you said

Keep the 4 digit number below safe. It\'ll be used by your authenticated trackers to access your location history on the web. Emails will be sent to your registered email addresses but You should send them this number just in case. :).
